channel.title: Caravaggio on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Caravaggio on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Matter of Life and Death
item.description:
Hypnotic start and common but strange finish.

Sometimes things not said or not shown are interesting.

Here I see ideas about thunderbolt, neuron growth, ladder, and “flight from Berlin”. Also script should have some ideas that did not make it into the movie.

There is propaganda angle to it which is fine by me. I think it is still strong even if the idea of Anglo-American cooperation in the new world is ignored.

item.title: The Cardsharps
item.description:
I have experienced the sudden escalation effect of the picture. I wonder if background information and other pictures influenced that experience too or the picture is self-contained.

I assume this picture for me has opened the door for other works of the author. I wonder if it casts a shadow too.

Spoilers

  • the artist was involved in stabbing a person to death over gambling matters
  • English naming of picture sounds sharp
  • other paintings too often have or imply sharp objects
